title: Buttons, late 19th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Enameled  button showing scene of gentleman handling flower to a lady surrounded by a ring of facetted steel knobs.

Component -a is on card 10
Component -b is on Cooper Union Exhibition card 8

tombstone.epitaph:
Buttons, late 19th century.
late 19th century. Brass, steel and colored enamel. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-397-a,b.
